## concatBytes() function

Concatenate multiple Uint8Arrays into one. Equivalent to `Buffer.concat(arrays)`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function concatBytes(...arrays: Uint8Array[]): Uint8Array;
```
